newsitem.title: USA: MRV Communications to offer 2.55 mln shrs.
newsitem.headline: MRV Communications to offer 2.55 mln shrs.

text.p: MRV Communications Inc said Thursday it filed a registration statement with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to offer 2.55 million shares of common stock.
Two million shares are being offered by the company, and 550,000 shares by certain shareholders.
In addition, the company will grant the underwriters an over-allotment option to buy up to 382,500 shares of common stock.

The company said it plans to use the proceeds from the offering for general corporate purposes, including expanding its marketing infrastructure and buying capital equipment, and for research and development and working capital.
The company may also use a portion of the proceeds for the possible acquisitions of businesses, products or technologies that are complementary to those of its own.
The offering is being managed by Bear, Stearns & Co Inc and Volpe Brown Whelan & Co.
MRV makes and sells high-speed network switching and fiber-optic transmission systems for data- and telecommunications networks.
